module.name: Regimen Pickup
module.author: Partners In Health
module.description: Provides the ability to record regimen pickup encounters and observations, and to display these in a calendar view

globalProperty.description: The encounterTypeId to use for Regimen Pickup Encounters
The conceptId to use for the question that asks what regimen was dispensed. This should be a question with text datatype

Allowed text answers to the meds dispensed question. This is a comma-delimited list. If the display value is different than the answer value, then the format should be answerValue:displayValue in the list
Optional property in yyyy-MM-dd format. If specified, this is the minimum supported pickup date
Comma-separated list of Location Names that are supported for regimen pickups
If true, this will display the descriptions of supported locations, rather than the names
The default provider to use for each entered regimen pickup encounter
If specified, this will support the default value of the pickup location for a patient
If specified, will display a warning if the patient is not in the specified program workflow states The format is PROGRAM NAME:WORKFLOW NAME:VALID STATE NAME|VALID STATE NAME
